item.title: Don’t give up on a ‘Santa Claus rally’ just yet — even after a rough December start for stocks
item.description: Investors may still get the “Santa Claus rally” they had hoped for, even though stocks have struggled to gain momentum so far in December.

item.title: Over age 65? Watch out for these costly mistakes when selling your home.
item.description: Older homeowners get less money selling their houses. Here’s how you can sweeten your listing to get more.

item.title: ‘He never asks for anything’: I’m 61 with a $1.5 million 401(k). My girlfriend says I do too much for my son, 28. Is she right?
item.description: “I recently gave him $20,000 for a newer car and had him finance the rest.”

item.title: ‘I’m terrified I’ll be homeless when my husband, 76, stops working’: We only have $100K. What happens to people like us?
item.description: “I’m sick of reading how many millions everyone has.”

item.title: ‘It’s heartbreaking’: My cousin died and her estranged husband has taken possession of her home. Can we evict him?
item.description: “The house remains in her name. He has since kicked out each of the boys one by one.”
